alert.note: Alert for Mills; Pottawattamie (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Omaha (Eastern Nebraska and Southeastern Iowa - Omaha Valley)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 20 at 6:18AM CDT by NWS Omaha
info.description: ... Strong winds in the Omaha-Council Bluffs Metro ... Wind gusts up to 50 to 60 mph have recently been reported in the area due to outflow from ongoing thunderstorms over western Iowa. The winds could last for the next 15 to 30 minutes before diminishing. Locations impacted include... Omaha, Council Bluffs, Bellevue, Papillion, Ralston, Gretna, Bennington, Boys Town, Elkhorn, Millard, Offutt AFB, La Vista, Plattsmouth, Glenwood, Carter Lake, Springfield, Louisville, Waterloo, Crescent and Pacific Junction. This includes the following highways... Interstate 29 between mile markers 25 and 66. Interstate 80 in Iowa between mile markers 1 and 11. Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 426 and 454.
